data.title: China wants to give all of its citizens a score – and their rating could affect every area of their lives: The Communist Party wants to encourage good behaviour by marking all its people using online data. Those who fall short will be denied basic freedoms like loans or travel
Mass prison break in Haiti, 174 inmates flee after killing guard

Japanese suicide pensioner blows himself up in park, injures three others

Spain aiming for 100 per cent renewable energy: "Enough wind energy is being generated in Spain to power more than 29 million homes every day, according to one of the country's biggest renewable energy companies."
Drug tunnel between U.S. and Mexico found inside Tijuana ice factory
ISIS executes 284 people including children in Mosul
Chinese police detain person, who posted a video of violent protests in china, for spreading rumors of labor unrest
Malala Yousafzai Wants To Be The Prime Minister Of Pakistan
British banks preparing to leave UK over Brexit
